subject: Re: GNOME App Install
body:
Qua, 2007-06-27 às 16:05 -0300, Gustavo Franco escreveu:
> While we're at it, would be good deuglify and integrate tasksel
> functionality into g-a-i. Upstream stuff I know, but I don't think
> that will be too hard if you want to do more than packaging. I can
> give guidance if you're interested. 

this would be even nicer if this supported also cdd's tasks and other
tasks that could be created, like development tasks (gnome-devel-C,
gnome-devel-cil, gnome-devel-java, gnome-devel-python, kde-devel-C ...
etc);

i think it's time for me to install g-a-i


--

with a subject of "unsubscribe". Trouble? Contact listmaster@lists.debian.org
